column5: First they postponed Sundays game to Monday night:  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/football/giants-vikings-game-postponed-by-storm/article1834440/  ...and then the metrodome's roof collapses  http://www.theglobeandmail.com/sports/football/minneapolis-metrodome-collapses-during-blizzard/article1834621/  http://www.startribune.com/  And it is on its way to southern Ontario and the like.
